title: Weekend reading
content: Does economics matter? – Chris Dillow How to Save Europe – George Soros Italy is a slow-motion train wreck but would it quit the euro? – Roubini & Rosa Should Economists Make Moral Judgments? – Jacek Rostowski Germany’s Prosperity: How Stable are the Foundations? – Tim Taylor Is GDP Overstating Economic Activity? – FRBSF Interview of Gabriel Zucman – ProMarket Trump is enabling a predatory economy – Helaine Olen The euro must be made more robust to rival the dollar – Financial Times Actually, the U.S. Can Afford Welfare – Justin Fox The Economics of Disintegration of the Greenland Ice Sheet – NBER
